meta.description: Marhaba Lounge at Dubai International Airport (DXB), Terminal 3, Concourse A. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

location.terminalDirections: Level 5, between Gates A2 and A3. Entrance is via dedicated elevator from the perfume area of the Duty Free Area.

general: Children under 2 years old are admitted free with an adult.
regulatory: This lounge is only accessible for passengers departing from Terminal 3.

reviews.content: The food was better than average for breakfast. Minimal power access and entirely too over crowded. Drink selection limited and hard to obtain when busy. Would prefer general population.
Just too crowded, seats were sleeping people's, there were reasonable food in this price. The access of CX Elite AE has changed, can only get in with PP.
What a disappointment. People sleeping everywhere, hogging seats. No seat available to simply enjoy a coffee and unwind for the upcoming holiday. Avoid this lounge during the morning rush.
Very basic and not worth paying to enter if youâ€™re looking for reasonable food.
Super weak lounge... almost better off staying in main terminal.
Comfy lounge but really poor food. Christmas cake was nice touch. Coffee machine spluttery. Could do with more cosy corners.
Average - shower not included in fee (!) Seem to tolerate screaming kids running around which is a real negative. Thank goodness for Bose headphones otherwise I would have walked out!!
Simple & nice with limited food choices.
For the size of T3, it's not big. There is a 4 hour limit (better than most). Showers charged to PP users. GoSleep units have now gone. It's clean, lots of power points, wifi is fast, staff friendly.
I could sit downstairs and have caviar and a beer in nicer surroundings with nicer staff. Really average. Much better in general population.
GREAT food for a PP lounge. Fast wifi. Amazing service. Love it. Could use more and better seating, but it's not busy now so no problem.
I'm tired and exhausted and Marhaba lounge helps me much.

Language barrier - may have been charged extra for not purchasing 24 hrs in advance. Would've been easier on app. Spacious lounge, great food, all drinks included (except champagne). Wi-fi slightly slow.
lounge was clean and comfortable. Food was reasonable (not outstanding). Would visit again, but there are better options at T3 (Lounge @ B).
Nicest Marhaba Lounge I've found at DXB. Quiet, comfortable, and spacious.
Visited this lounge 03/15. Had to pay for the shower but it was convenient and clean. Good selection of food/drink and the staff fine. Plenty of seating options. Imagine lounge is busy at peak times.
Near your favourite gate is the crowded Marhaba Lounge. You probably should pre-book to save some money and hopefully don't get in a bad mood like the workers here.

Reception staff happy to chat with each other but not to sort queries. Food/facilities ok. Disappointing  that not made clear that showers not included. Adequate but wouldn't use again unless improved
Poor lounge, just a normal airport cafe behind a desk. Far too crowded, no decent seating and too many kids
This is the best lounge among the Marhaba Lounges (the other ones are in T1 and T2).
This is a nice, clean lounge. However, not many flights leave from this lounge's terminal.
This is a nice place in Terminal 3 to come relax, especially if you're coming off a long haul.

location.terminalDirections: Arrivals Area.

otherLounges.name: Their Patio by Plaza Premium Group

location.terminalDirections: Located in the arrivals area after exiting baggage claim.
Take the lift located next to the souvenir shop to Level 6. Located prior to Gates A1-A12.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the elevators located between Gates A1 and A24 to the Hotel Reception on Level 6.
Level 4, between Gates A1 and A24.
Located in the West Wing of Concourse A, between Gates A2 and A3. Take the lift from the Duty Free Area to the entrance on Level 4.
Opposite Gate A1 in the Duty Free Area.
5th Floor, between Gates A1 and A24
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the elevators located near Gates B14 or B22 to the Hotel Reception.
4th Floor, between Gates B16 and B18, near the Information Desk.

otherLounges.name: Lounge @ B (Closed for Renovation, Temp Lounge at Gate B22)

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate B26, above McDonald's on the 2nd Floor, accessible via escalator, entrance is located inside the Cadiz Tapas Bar.
Level 4, near Gate B21, entrance is right after XpresSpa.

otherLounges.name: Sleep n' Fly Sleep Lounge, Business Pods and Showers

location.terminalDirections: Located between Gates B14 and B18, close to the Emirates Connections Desk.
5th Floor, between Gates B16 and B18.
Located next to Gate C13.
After Security Checkpoint and Passport Control, take the escalators or elevators located between Gates C15 and C17 to the Hotel Reception.
East End of Concourse C, between Gates C21 and C23.

C-Gates, Central Lower Level Duty Free Area. Lounge check-in is via the separate main reception at departure gate level next to Gate C14. The sleep 'n fly lounge is located one level down in the Duty Free Area.
Near Gate C8.
Near Gate C28.
